item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, I am Aşkın Özgür. I am a software developer. I live in İzmir/Karşıyaka and work as a Senior Software Developer at FYK Technology. You can reach me by clicking the social media icons below. Or you can send me an email: askin@askin.ws Experience Date Company 2022 - Günümüz Senior Backend Developer @ FYK Teknoloji (İzmir/Türkiye) 2013 - 2022 Software Developer @ Hermes İletişim (İzmir/Türkiye) 2010 - 2013 Software Developer @ Dokuz Eylül University (İzmir/Türkiye) 2010 (7 Ay) Web Developer @ Dokuz Eylül University (İzmir/Türkiye) 2009 (1 Ay) Intern @ Tubitak UEKAE (Gebze/Türkiye) Education Date School 2004-2013 BS.
